text: Taywara (Teyvareh) district is located in the southern part of Ghor Province in Afghanistan. The population is 88,900 people. The district center is the town of Taywara. The district has 400 km of gravel roads. The terrain is mountainous and in the winter the roads are often inaccessible. == References == == External links == * Map of Settlements IMMAP, September 2011 Category:Districts of Ghor Province
title: Taywara District
